content.value:
Cedron Hostel is located in a house that was built 250 years ago in colonial style. It has in it's interior courtyards and also comfortable common places so that the clients may chat, play cards and share nice moments. It is nearby touristic places, such as Plaza de Bolivar.

Cedron Hostel, can offer private and shared rooms.

Cedron Hostel is offering accommodation in Bogotá. Featuring a garden, the hostel is close to several noted attractions, around 500 m from Luis Angel Arango Library and around 450 m from Quevedo's Jet. The property is located 750 m from Bolivar Square.

Staff at the reception can provide advice on what to do in the area.
Candelaria - Centro Historico is a great choice for travellers interested in museums, old town exploring and history.

description.description: Cedron Hostel is located in a colonial style house in the neighbourhood La Candelaria that belongs to the Historical Center in Bogota Colombia. It has, in it's interior a beautiful and rather big garden, it is located in a quiet area, near many touristic, historical and interesting architectural places, all of winch make a grateful and unforgettable stay in this hostel.
